label.span: Do you have a national ID?

div.div: UID must be exactly 12 characters long.

label.span: Do you have a personal phone number?
Is the Farmer a member of primary cooperative?
What is the name of the primary cooperative?
Are you a member of cooperative union?
What is the name of the cooperative union?
Are you registered in a farmer cluster?
What is your role in the cluster?
What's your water source for crop production?

option.t-att-selected: 'selected' if option.id in (beneficiary.crop_water_sources.ids or []) else None

label.span: What's your water source for livestock production?

option.t-att-selected: 'selected' if option.id in (beneficiary.livestock_water_sources.ids or []) else None

label.span: What kind of animals do you own?
How many animals do you own?

How many animals do you own?
What's the amount of fertiliser you've used?

What's the amount of insecticide you've used?
What's the amount of improved seed you've used?
What kind of machinery do you use?
Do you have access to financial services?
What type of finance access do you have?
